DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study evaluate use dopamine transporter ( DAT ) image diagnostic tool subject early parkinsonian symptom , Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) parkinsonian syndrome ( PS ) suspect , diagnosis remain unclear clinical standpoint .
DOC.brief_title: Study Individuals With Parkinson 's Symptoms But Whom There Diagnostic Uncertainty
DOC.detailed_description: - Subjects refer Institute Neurodegenerative Disorders ( IND ) practice general neurologist genuine uncertainty regard subject 's diagnosis . - Subjects suspect PD PS evaluate clinically DAT imaging , use b-CIT SPECT . The DAT imaging procedure take place two day : - On first day participant inject [ 123I ] ÃŸ CIT , investigational radioactive material localize brain . Study participant also thorough neurologic examination standard neuropsychological testing , include test memory , concentration , abstraction visual spatial function . - Twenty-four hour later study participant return Institute Neurodegenerative Disorders investigational scanning procedure use obtain SPECT ( single photon emission compute tomography ) image brain . - Subjects asked return within 3 month follow image study repeat neurological examination two study neurologist IND . - Subjects ask return 6 month possibly one year follow imaging study final clinical evaluation one study neurologist IND .
DOC.criteria: Age > 21 Any parkinsonian extrapyramidal symptom Parkinsonian symptom < 2 year duration . No significant abnormality screen laboratory study include : CBC , Chem20 urinalysis . Willingness comply study protocol . Pregnancy Significant medical disease include abnormality screen biochemical hematological lab abnormal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) .
